summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of McClellan Street from the east margin of Mt. Baker Blvd. To the east margin of Mt. Rainier Drive in the City of Seattle, by constructing side sewer connections under Ordinance No. 20122, creating Local Improvement District No. 1947 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
